actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to permit institutions to participate in the veterans' cost-of-living instruction program when at least 5 percentum of their undergraduate students are veterans.

summary.text: Permits institutions to participate in the veterans' cost-of-instruction program when at least 5 percent of their undergraduate students are veterans.

titles.title: A bill to permit institutions to participate in the veterans' cost-of-living instruction program when at least 5 percentum of their undergraduate students are veterans.
